body_html:
Have I written custom code --> No just clone it from git (tensorflow/models repository)
TensorFlow installed from --> using azure dataBricks clusters (tensorflow pre-installed with latest version)
TensorFlow version->1-.8
CUDA/cuDNN version -->pre-installed in azure dataBricks clusters
GPU model and memory ->
Exact command to reproduce ->train.py (and passing all the necessary argument)

-->We are storing all the checkpoint in dbfs .
Q) is tensorflow is having any issues while saving its checkpoint in dbfs?

Some pointers i)when we ran for only 50 steps of training, it ran successfully and finished the training without any error
ii)After testing with 50 odd steps when we increase the number of steps from 50 to 20k it get errored out between 80 to 90 steps (error is mentioned above)

body:
**Have I written custom code --> No just clone it from git (tensorflow/models repository)
TensorFlow installed from --> using azure dataBricks clusters (tensorflow pre-installed with latest version)
TensorFlow version->1-.8
CUDA/cuDNN version -->pre-installed in azure dataBricks clusters
GPU model and memory ->
Exact command to reproduce**  ->train.py (and passing all the necessary argument)

-->We are storing all the checkpoint in **dbfs** .
Q) is tensorflow is having any issues while saving its checkpoint in dbfs?

Some pointers  i)when we ran for only 50 steps of training, it ran successfully and finished the training without any error 
ii)After testing with 50 odd steps when we increase the number of steps from 50 to 20k it get errored out between 80 to 90 steps (error is mentioned above)
